I use Scotiabank to do most of my banking.  It's great on that site.  Royal Bank though will not allow me to auto sync it.  The way that I do this is to go to the Royal Bank site and then download to Quicken.  Not sure why this is with this particular institution, but it does update this way.  If anyone figures out a way, then please post.  MonnOmsap, I wish I could help more.

Many Canadian banks will not allow a third party to obtain information on your behalf.  Quicken is a third party.  It is a privacy related issue with the banks.  That is not a problem with Quicken
